reviews.comment: Jupitair came out same day when our AC broke during the heat wave. Professional, fast, and fair pricing. Highly recommend for Frisco HVAC needs!
Great experience with Jupitair for our new heat pump installation in Plano. Clean work, explained everything clearly, and finished on time.
Annual maintenance visit was thorough and professional. Found a small issue that could have been expensive later. Thanks Jupitair!
Ductwork repair in our Allen home was done perfectly. No more hot/cold spots and much quieter system now.
Best HVAC company in Prosper! They installed our new Trane system and the difference is amazing. Lower bills and perfect comfort!
Emergency service at midnight - they actually showed up within an hour! Fixed our AC and didn't charge extra for the late hour. Incredible!
Jupitair has serviced our business for 3 years. Always reliable, professional, and honest. Wouldn't trust anyone else!
Thermostat upgrade to smart home system was seamless. Tech was knowledgeable and patient with setup. Love controlling it from my phone!
Fair pricing, excellent service! They fixed what another company said needed full replacement. Saved us thousands!
Indoor air quality assessment and UV light installation. My allergies have improved dramatically. Worth every penny!
